text: “You hear about slavery for 400 years. For 400 years? That sounds like a choice,” he said Tuesday on TMZ Live, where he had gone to discuss some of the ideas he’s been throwing around on Twitter in recent days. “Like, you was there for 400 years, and it's all of y'all?”
title: Kanye West's music banned by radio station after slavery remarks

meta_data.description: “We feel like Kanye has gone too far with his latest statement declaring that ‘slavery was a choice,’” Detroit radio hosts Shay Shay and BiGG said Thursday. "We just are refusing to give him a platform."
